short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Chrome extension to remove the names of terrible people

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Replaces the names of school shooters and mass murderers with "a monster". They do not deserve the fame and attention so replace them with what they really are.
